info.name: Feats
info.description: Feats from the World of Royan.
info.author: Troublefinder Games

description.p: Thanks to extensive practice with the Titascium Firearm, you gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You ignore the loading quality of Titascium Firearms with which you are proficient.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn’t impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.
When you use the Attack action and attack with a one-handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a Titascium Pistol you are holding.
